title: Wendy's Is Trolling McDonald's On Twitter, And We Are EATING IT UP!
text:
Wendy's and McDonald's have beef on Twitter â€” and it's all about beef!
It all started when Mickey D's posted about their intention to start using fresh, not frozen, ground beef for their burgers. Some time next year.
Related: OMG, You Can Get Married At Taco Bell Now 
We don't know if Wendy's had just moved their most merciless employee from the fries to the Twitter account, but the rival fast food chain was quick to spot the weakness of the announcement and POUNCE on it.
What followed was social media savagery!
Ch-ch-check it out (below)! 
. @McDonalds So youâ€™ll still use frozen beef in MOST of your burgers in ALL of your restaurants? Asking for a friend.
â€” Wendy's (@Wendys) March 30, 2017 

But that wasn't all. The red-haired avatar was unrelentingâ€¦
@DFusions @McDonalds Only when the ice cream machine isn't broken.

@DStoneColdFox @McDonalds They'll probably get back to us by mid-2018

D mn! We never knew Wendy was a troll! If only she could flip those pigtails, the sass would be complete!
Meanwhile we're juet watching likeâ€¦
